message: Alright… I skimmed this. You've done a lot of robotics stuff. Were you actually coding most of that, or more like… organizing people?
Both. Led architecture and implemented core autonomy and perception systems.
This Mask R-CNN thing on the rover — why that? Seems heavy for a student project.
Needed reliable instance segmentation for custom objects. It performed best after fine-tuning.
You mentioned Soft Actor-Critic for the rover arm. Did that actually work in the real world or just in simulation?
Sim first. Then transferred to hardware with constrained action space. Stable performance.
This forest fire project sounds… ambitious. Did you really build a NeRF for that?
Yes. Used it as a spatial prior in a transformer for environmental feature queries.
